title: Buckstop
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Rhian Hinkley
brief_description: Five minutes of animation through the use of 3,000 still photographs serves as a homage to the spaghetti Western, as Buck rides into town looking for a bit of action and a parking space.
creator_credit_for_label: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Rhian Hinkley
description: Five minutes of animation through the use of 3,000 still photographs serves as a homage to the spaghetti Western, as Buck rides into town looking for a bit of action and a parking space.
